title: Camp WeWow Weather Week Day 2
description:
It's Weather Week at Camp WeWow! Today, we're making our own rain clouds!! Visit tinkercast.com/resource/experiment-make-your-own-rain-cloud for directions to today's activity and share what you're tinkering with at tinkercast.com/share! What's the weather like in your imagination?! Call us at 1-888-7WOW-WOW to share your original weather forecast! You just might get featured around the Camp WeWow Campfire this Friday!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
